vclaim: As of July 13, 2021, the state of New York has repealed an archaic law that banned the act of barbering on Sundays. It is now technically legal to operate barber shops on that day of the week.
title: Is It No Longer Illegal for Barbershops to Cut Hair on Sundays in New York?
subtitle: An archaic law may have been long overdue for a cut.
author: Nur Ibrahim
